text: @maddow Wonder how many of those w/ newly detected COVID-19 infection attended protests and/or riots over the previous 10 days? Funny how we were told it was too dangerous to get your hair cut or go to church b/c of the virus, but suddenly it became safe to join thousands in protest? 🤨
